name: CastleCrush
description: A little game to paly together over the network

scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run watch:html -s" "npm run watch:css -s" "npm run watch:js -s" "npm run server"
scripts.build: npm run build:html & npm run build:css & npm run build:js
scripts.build:html: pug index.pug -o dist & pug templates -o dist/templates
scripts.watch: concurrently -k "npm run watch:html -s" "npm run watch:css -s" "npm run watch:js -s"
